typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		mve_gkey as integer,
		Unit_Nbr as string,
		Facility_Id as string,
		Complex_Id as string,
		Yard_Id as string,
		Carrier_Visit_Key as integer,
		Event_Type_Id as string,
		Move_Kind as string,
		From_Location as string,
		To_Location as string,
		From_Position_Name as string,
		To_Position_Name as string,
		Carry_CHE_Operator_Id as short,
		Fetch_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Put_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Fetch_CHE_Id as long,
		Fetch_CHE_Kind as string,
		Carry_CHE_Id as long,
		Carry_CHE_Kind as string,
		Put_CHE_Id as long,
		Put_CHE_Kind as string,
		QC_CHE_Id as long,
		QC_CHE_Kind as string,
		t_carry_complete as timestamp,
		t_put as timestamp,
		t_fetch as timestamp,
		t_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_discharge as timestamp,
		t_carry_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_carry_fetch_ready as timestamp,
		t_carry_put_ready as timestamp,
		dist_carry as integer,
		dist_start as short,
		Twin_Fetch as string,
		Twin_Carry as string,
		Twin_Put as string,
		Category_Id as string,
		Freight_Kind_Id as string,
		to_pos_gkey as integer,
		fm_pos_gkey as integer,
		Restow_Reason as string,
		Container_Line_Id as string,
		Container_Line_Role as string,
		pow as string,
		ufv_gkey as integer,
		Berth_Id as string,
		Goods_And_Ctr_Wt_Kg as double,
		active_ufv as integer,
		Requires_Power_Flag as string,
		OOG_Flag as string,
		Shipper_Id as string,
		Consignee_Id as string,
		Commodity_Id as string,
		ATA as timestamp,
		ATD as timestamp,
		Rehandles as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'hazira',
	folderPath: 'silver/moves') ~> source1
aggregate1 window(over(Carry_CHE_Id),
	asc(t_carry_complete, true),
	startRowOffset: -1L,
	endRowOffset: -1L,
	Carry_CHE_Id_PREV = lag(Carry_CHE_Id),
		Event_Type_Id_PREV = lag(Event_Type_Id),
		t_carry_complete_PREV = lag(t_carry_complete)) ~> window1
filter2 derive(Cycle_Type = iif(Carry_CHE_Id==Carry_CHE_Id_PREV && dayOfYear(t_carry_complete)==dayOfYear(t_carry_complete_PREV),
(
iif(Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_LOAD',
iif(Event_Type_Id_PREV=='UNIT_LOAD','Half Load Cycle','Discharge to Load Cycle'),
iif(Event_Type_Id_PREV=='UNIT_DISCH','Half Discharge Cycle','Load to Discharge Cycle'))
),
iif(Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_LOAD','Half Load Cycle','Half Discharge Cycle')),
		DSCH_Laden_Duration_Sec = iif(Move_Kind == 'DSCH', (toLong(t_carry_complete) - toLong(t_discharge))/1000, toLong(null())),
		DSCH_UnLaden_Duration_Sec01 = iif(Move_Kind == 'DSCH', (toLong(t_discharge) - toLong(t_carry_dispatch))/1000, toLong(null())),
		DSCH_Cycle_Duration_Sec = iif(Move_Kind == 'DSCH', (toLong(t_carry_complete) - toLong(t_carry_dispatch))/1000, toLong(null())),
		Laden_Travel_Service_Sec = iif(Move_Kind == 'DSCH', (toLong(t_carry_complete) - toLong(t_discharge))/1000, toLong(null())),
		Load_Unladen_Duration_Sec = iif(Move_Kind == 'LOAD', (toLong(t_fetch) - toLong(t_carry_dispatch))/1000, toLong(null())),
		Load_Laden_Duration_Sec = iif(Move_Kind == 'LOAD', (toLong(t_carry_complete) - toLong(t_fetch))/1000, toLong(null())),
		Load_Cycle_Duration_Sec = iif(Move_Kind == 'LOAD', (toLong(t_carry_complete) - toLong(t_carry_dispatch))/1000, toLong(null())),
		Unladen_Travel_Service_Sec = iif(Move_Kind == 'LOAD', (toLong(t_fetch) - toLong(t_carry_dispatch))/1000, toLong(null()))) ~> derivedColumn1
select1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
filter1 aggregate(groupBy(mve_gkey),
	each(match(name!='mve_gkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> aggregate1
derivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		mve_gkey,
		Unit_Nbr,
		Facility_Id,
		Event_Type_Id,
		Move_Kind,
		t_carry_complete,
		t_put,
		t_fetch,
		t_dispatch,
		t_discharge,
		t_carry_dispatch,
		t_carry_fetch_ready,
		t_carry_put_ready,
		dist_carry,
		dist_start,
		PreviousJobCompletion = t_carry_complete_PREV,
		DSCH_Laden_Duration_Sec,
		DSCH_UnLaden_Duration_Sec01,
		DSCH_Cycle_Duration_Sec,
		Laden_Travel_Service_Sec,
		Load_Unladen_Duration_Sec,
		Load_Laden_Duration_Sec,
		Load_Cycle_Duration_Sec,
		Unladen_Travel_Service_Sec,
		Dsch_Unladen_Duration_Sec,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
source1 filter(equals(Carry_CHE_Kind,'ITV') && equals(isNull(Carry_CHE_Id),false()) && equals(isNull(t_carry_complete),false())) ~> filter1
window1 filter((Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_LOAD' || Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_DISCH')) ~> filter2
derivedColumn1 derive(Dsch_Unladen_Duration_Sec = iif(
    DSCH_UnLaden_Duration_Sec01 == 0 && t_carry_complete_PREV <= t_discharge,
    (toLong(t_discharge) - toLong(t_carry_complete_PREV)) / 1000,
    DSCH_UnLaden_Duration_Sec01
)) ~> derivedColumn2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'hazira',
	folderPath: 'gold/TTWaitTime',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['mve_gkey'],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1
